title: Emerging Assets Rise as Investors Revive ‘Sell America’ Trade
description: Emerging-market assets gained Monday in a session marked by a weaker dollar and a revival of the “Sell America” trade, after the US Justice Department threatened the Federal Reserve with a criminal indictment.
content: Emerging-market assets gained Monday in a session marked by a weaker dollar and a revival of the “Sell America” trade, after the US Justice Department threatened the Federal Reserve with a criminal indictment.
